WKT: The invaders tried to advance near Vyimka and Ivano-Daryivka with offensive and assault actions
name: were strongly repulsed and retreated.

description: Ukrainian defenders repelled an attack on Vyimka (8). This town is heavily fortified and vitally important to the defense of this area. Russians have attacked Vyimka several times over the past few weeks but failed to create the foothold necessary for a sustained attack.

There is heavy ongoing fighting around Yakovlivka (9). Russian forces are attempting to flank around the right side of the town while simultaneously attacking from the south. Russians have captured around 10% of Yakovlivka. Ukrainians hold the high ground just north
column4: stymying the Russian assault.

description: Russians are still trying to capture Pisky (20). A Ukrainian claims that Ukraine controls the town “situationally” and “conditionally.” I am under the impression that Ukrainian officers believe they could retake Pisky if given the necessary resources (heavy weapons). However
column4: I do not think they will get what they need. I believe Ukraine is saving these resources for a potential offensive. In the meantime
column5: Russia is struggling to take control of the town
column6: and they have tried bypassing it to attack Pervomaiske.

description: Today Russians posted videos of Ukrainian defensive positions they claim to have captured around Marinka. Assuming the videos are recent and in Marinka
column4: they appear to be in an open field
column5: which means they would almost certainly be fighting through the farmland south of Marinka (21). From prior reports
column6: I know Russia is moving through these fields because the urban combat in Marinka itself is too intense.

description: Repelled

column5: it suffered losses and retreated chaotically.

description: In the Kherson/Mykolaiv area
column4: Russia attacked in the direction of Bila Krynytsya from Lozove (23)
column5: which means Ukraine almost certainly lost Andriivka and Lozove. There is ongoing fighting. Russia has expended great resources crushing the Ukrainian bridgehead across the Inhulets
column6: and it seems the bridgehead could be crumbling.

description: Russians tried to attack in the direction of Tavrijske
column4: but Ukrainian defenders destroyed this attack and sent the Russian attackers fleeing in a panic (24).

name: B
description: Russia is heavily shelling the Zaporizhzhia area
column4: and the Ukrainian counter-battery fire is slowly destroying Russian artillery systems. There was quite a lot of artillery fire around the towns of Dorozhnyanka and Kostyantynivka (B). Ukraine has been trying to capture these two towns for a few weeks. I did not see any news of a Ukrainian attack in this area
column5: but the concentration of artillery fire makes me believe they probably did.
